summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackCurlsmith Effortless Waves Styling Spray is a lightweight styling spray providing soft hold and definition to wavy hair without the crunch, while helping to reduce frizz.
details: DetailsBenefitsEnhances natural waves, lightweight without weighing hair down. Plus smooths hair with no crunch.Soft touchable waves that are totally crunch-freeReduces frizz by 78%*86% agreed their waves were more defined after using this product**87% felt this product was perfect for naturally wavy hair***Based on third party testing**Based on an independent study on wavy hair.FeaturesWHO IS IT FOR? Wavy hair and all texturesBEST FOR: All the wavies out there wanting to unleash their natural wavesFORMAT: SprayHOLD LEVEL: 3- Invisible holdColor-SafeMade without sulphates, silicones or drying alcoholsItem 2643513How To UseApply to wet hair. Spray throughout the mid-lengths and ends of hair. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Propanediol, VP/VA Copolymer, Betaine, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Selaginella Lepidophylla Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Leaf Extract, Piper Nigrum (Black Pepper) Seed Extract, Sclerotium Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Gluconate, Citric Acid, Glycerin, Caprylic Acid, Xylitol, Laurtrimonium Chloride, Sodium Bisulfite, Benzyl Alcohol, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Linalool, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Pinene.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair. Spray throughout the mid-lengths and ends of hair. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.
